member.summary: Run a WebSharper sitelet as a Suave WebPart.
member.param: The root of the application. (default: working directory)
The directory containing the application's binaries. (default: WebSharper.Suave.dll's location)
The prefix under which to serve the application. (default: "")
The WebPart to run on unmatched URLs. (default: RequestErrors.NOT_FOUND "File not found")
Whether to also serve Script and Content resources. (default: true)
